step1_description: Your contract will be deployed. Please confirm in Metamask.
step2_description: This service needs to have minter role of your contract to mint NFTs. Please confirm in Metamask.
step3_description: By signing this, you can prepare the NFT with the uploaded image. You can skip this operation, but in that case you will need to do it yourself from the Thirdweb dashboard.
can_edit_description: The contract is Thridweb's contract, so you can edit in Thirdweb's dashboard.
can_create_description: You can create your own NFT contract without paying gas.
